Description: Baked clay sealing with Egyptian seal-impression on one side depicting Harpocrates seated on a lotus flower; abraded; chipped; deposit.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir Austen Henry Layard
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.367)
Layard A H 1853a / Discoveries in the ruins of Nineveh and Babylon, with travels in Armenia, Kurdistan and the desert (p.155-156)
